      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ATSHook
      ATSHook sends query + plan info to Yarn App Timeline Server.
      class  EnforceReadOnlyTables
      Implementation of a pre execute hook that prevents modifications of read-only tables used by the test framework
      class  HiveProtoLoggingHook
      Log events from hive hook using protobuf serialized format, partitioned by date.
      class  LineageLogger
      Implementation of a post execute hook that logs lineage info to a log file.
      class  MaterializedViewRegistryPropertiesHook
      Implementation of a pre execute hook that reloads the materialized view registry if needed by the test framework
      class  NoOperatorReuseCheckerHook
      Checks whenever operator ids are not reused.
      class  PostExecOrcFileDump
      Post exec hook to print orc file dump for files that will be read by fetch task.
      class  PostExecOrcRowGroupCountPrinter
      Post execution hook to print number of ORC row groups read from the counter.
      class  PostExecTezSummaryPrinter
      Post execution hook to print hive tez counters to console error stream.
      class  PostExecutePrinter
      Implementation of a post execute hook that simply prints out its parameters to standard output.
      class  PostExecWMEventsSummaryPrinter
      Post execution (success or failure) hook to print hive workload manager events summary.
      class  PreExecutePrinter
      Implementation of a pre execute hook that simply prints out its parameters to standard output.
      class  RuntimeStatsPersistenceCheckerHook
      This hook adds a persistence loop-back ensure that runtime statistics could be used.
      static class  UpdateInputAccessTimeHook.PreExec
